title: Making Good!
content:
"Novelty fonts, weird fonts, outline fonts, shadow fonts—these have no place in any document created by a lawyer. Save it for your next career as a designer of breakfast-cereal boxes."

A graduate of the Font Bureau Institute of Typography strikes out in a new direction:
